column1: are you suggesting i should just let you vomit unwanted garbage onto me? i should just accept your diarrhea of the mouth i didn’t ask for?

I just finished chapter 11 of “10 Things I Hate About You”   Here are some behind the scenes facts you guys don’t even know about fanfic writers:  • I now have a headache • The chapter is around 3K words long and it took me about 8 hours from start to finish  • I’m drained

Hi my name is holly and i found an open can of alcohol in my fridge thats almost empty but im drinking it anyway to hopefully get rid of my headache  welcome to my ted talk today on being responsible and adult decisions-
